languages.text: "А теперь — прочь, прочь от кошмаров, что простирают свои стрекала в самые потаенные уголки моей израненной души!"

traits.locale_text: "А теперь — прочь, прочь от кошмаров, что простирают свои стрекала в самые потаенные уголки моей израненной души!"

languages.text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"
languages.original_text: "А теперь — прочь, прочь от кошмаров, что простирают свои стрекала в самые потаенные уголки моей израненной души!"

traits.locale_text: "And now let us be away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
"And now let us be away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
"And now let us run away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
"And now let us run away from the nightmares that reach their stings into the darkest recesses of my hurting soul!"
"And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"
"And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

languages.text: 「私の傷ついた魂の最も暗い奥底に刺し込む悪夢から逃げましょう！」
languages.original_text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の傷ついた魂の最も暗い奥底にトゲを刺そうとする悪夢から逃げましょう！」

languages.text: “至于现在，让我们逃离这场噩梦吧，它的毒刺已经刺入了我残损的灵魂深处！”
languages.original_text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: “至于现在，让我们逃离这场噩梦吧，它的毒刺已经刺入了我的灵魂深处！”

languages.text: «¡Y ahora alejémonos de las pesadillas que clavan sus aguijones en los más oscuros recovecos de mi alma asolada!».
languages.original_text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y ahora huyamos de las pesadillas que introducen sus aguijones en los más oscuros recovecos de mi alma dolorida!».

languages.text: "Und nun lasst uns vor den Albträumen fliehen, die ihre Stachel in die tiefsten Winkel meiner gequälten Seele stoßen!"
languages.original_text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Und nun lasst uns vor den Albträumen fliehen, die ihre Stachel in die tiefsten Winkel meiner schmerzenden Seele stechen!"

languages.text: « Et maintenant, quittons ces cauchemars qui viennent s'ancrer jusque dans les tréfonds de mon âme meurtrie ! »
languages.original_text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, quittons ces cauchemars qui viennent s'ancrer jusque dans les tréfonds de mon âme meurtrie ! »

languages.text: "Perişan ruhumun en karanlık köşelerini işgal eden bu karabasanlardan uzaklaşalım artık!"
languages.original_text: "And now let us walk away from the nightmares that sink their stings into the darkest recesses of my ravaged soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Perişan ruhumun en karanlık köşelerini işgal eden bu karabasanlardan uzaklaşalım artık!"
